job_descriptions.title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer
job_descriptions.description:
We are looking for a Senior Machine Learning Engineer to join our AI team. You will design and implement ML models for production systems.

Responsibilities:
- Design, develop, and deploy machine learning models
- Work with large-scale data pipelines
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams
- Mentor junior engineers

Requirements:
- 5+ years of experience in ML/AI
- Strong Python programming skills
- Experience with TensorFlow or PyTorch
- Knowledge of deep learning architectures
- Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP)
- Strong communication skills

job_descriptions.title: Frontend Developer
job_descriptions.description:
Join our dynamic team as a Frontend Developer. Build beautiful, responsive web applications.

Responsibilities:
- Develop responsive web applications using React
- Collaborate with designers and backend teams
- Optimize applications for performance
- Write clean, maintainable code

Requirements:
- 3+ years of frontend development experience
- Strong proficiency in React.js
- Experience with TypeScript
- Knowledge of modern CSS and HTML5
- Familiarity with REST APIs

job_descriptions.title: DevOps Engineer
job_descriptions.description:
We need a DevOps Engineer to manage our cloud infrastructure and CI/CD pipelines.

Responsibilities:
- Design and maintain CI/CD pipelines
- Manage cloud infrastructure on AWS/GCP
- Implement infrastructure as code
- Monitor system performance and reliability

Requirements:
- 4+ years of DevOps experience
- Strong experience with Kubernetes and Docker
- Proficiency in Terraform or CloudFormation
- Experience with Jenkins, GitLab CI, or GitHub Actions
- Knowledge of monitoring tools (Prometheus, Grafana)

job_descriptions.title: Full Stack Developer
job_descriptions.description:
Looking for a versatile Full Stack Developer to build end-to-end features.

Responsibilities:
- Develop frontend and backend features
- Design database schemas
- Build RESTful APIs
- Participate in code reviews

Requirements:
- 3+ years of full stack experience
- Proficiency in React and Node.js
- Experience with PostgreSQL or MongoDB
- Knowledge of REST and GraphQL
- Familiarity with cloud services

job_descriptions.title: Data Scientist
job_descriptions.description:
Join our data science team to derive insights from complex datasets.

Responsibilities:
- Analyze large datasets to find patterns
- Build predictive models
- Create data visualizations
- Present findings to stakeholders

Requirements:
- 3+ years of data science experience
- Strong Python and SQL skills
- Experience with pandas, numpy, scikit-learn
- Knowledge of statistical analysis
- Experience with data visualization tools

job_descriptions.title: Senior Backend Engineer
job_descriptions.description:
Senior Backend Engineer needed to build scalable microservices.

Responsibilities:
- Design and implement microservices architecture
- Optimize database performance
- Build high-throughput APIs
- Lead technical design discussions

Requirements:
- 6+ years of backend development
- Strong Java or Python skills
- Experience with Spring Boot or Django
- Knowledge of message queues (Kafka, RabbitMQ)
- Experience with microservices architecture

job_descriptions.title: iOS Developer
job_descriptions.description:
iOS Developer to build native mobile applications.

Responsibilities:
- Develop iOS applications using Swift
- Work with UIKit and SwiftUI
- Integrate with REST APIs
- Ensure app performance and quality

Requirements:
- 3+ years of iOS development
- Strong Swift programming skills
- Experience with Xcode and iOS SDK
- Knowledge of Core Data and networking
- App Store deployment experience

job_descriptions.title: Cloud Solutions Architect
job_descriptions.description:
Cloud Solutions Architect to design enterprise cloud solutions.

Responsibilities:
- Design cloud architecture for clients
- Lead cloud migration projects
- Ensure security and compliance
- Provide technical leadership

Requirements:
- 7+ years of IT experience with 4+ in cloud
- AWS or Azure certifications preferred
- Experience with infrastructure as code
- Strong understanding of networking and security
- Excellent communication skills

job_descriptions.title: QA Automation Engineer
job_descriptions.description:
QA Automation Engineer to build test frameworks and ensure quality.

Responsibilities:
- Design and implement test automation frameworks
- Write automated tests for web and API
- Perform regression and performance testing
- Collaborate with development teams

Requirements:
- 3+ years of QA automation experience
- Experience with Selenium or Cypress
- Knowledge of Python or JavaScript
- Experience with CI/CD integration
- Understanding of Agile methodologies

job_descriptions.title: AI/LLM Engineer
job_descriptions.description:
AI/LLM Engineer to work on cutting-edge language models and RAG systems.

Responsibilities:
- Develop LLM-powered applications
- Build RAG pipelines with vector databases
- Fine-tune and optimize language models
- Integrate with existing systems

Requirements:
- 3+ years of ML/AI experience
- Experience with transformers and LLMs
- Knowledge of LangChain, OpenAI API
- Experience with vector databases (Pinecone, Weaviate)
- Strong Python skills

metadata.description: Sample job descriptions for resume screening evaluation
